infobox.Japanese title:: 小五郎のデート殺人事件  (Kogorō no Dēto Satsujin Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Detective Boys
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Izumi Shimura (sub-character)  Yasuhiro Moriki (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima, Next Conan's Hint  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Yoko Soumi as Sachiko Shimamura  Kazuyuki Ishikawa as Friend  Isshin Chiba as Station announcement  Rika Iwamoto as Grade school student

sections.Situation: After drinking with a friend who hasn't met for ten years, Kogoro falls asleep on a train and awakens to find himself a person that is willing to go on a date with him. When she stops at home though, she finds a person murdered and causes Kogoro and Conan to start seeking out whether she's guilty or if someone else is involved.
sections.People:
- 31 years old
- Import sales director
- Victim (stabbed)
- 29 years old
- Sachiko's roommate
- Salesperson
- Kogoro's old friend
- Office worker
- Elementary school boy
- Elementary school boy
- Elementary school boy
- Delivery courier
sections.Resolution: Sachiko confesses and reveals Kazumi was blackmailing her because she sold a product that it was prohibited to sale in Japan, and she was threatening Sachiko to report her in the police.
sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Sachiko Shimamura - Sonia Shadowly
- Kazumi Takenaka - Vicki Bowen
sections.Trivia:
- Sachiko Shimamura's car is a red Mitsubishi Libero Monte [CB5W].
- This nearly was a case Kogoro solved awake, however due to him slipping and falling Conan had to take over.
- This is one of the few cases that Conan solves as The Sleeping Kogoro without using his Stun-Gun Wristwatch to knock him out, as Kogoro manages to get knocked out by mistake from slipping and hitting his head.
